job_history.role_name: Senior Lending Officer - VP Executive Officer
job_history.work_description: Responsible for the Management and Development of six(6) Commercial Lending Officers whose roles and responsibilities include the development of new business within their assigned areas of responsibilities and portfolios. Achieved an average of $60,000.0 in new commercial lending originations over the last five years . C&I and CREM portfolio active balance growth for the bank to over $150,000.0 representing a 5% year/year growth rate.
Responsible for the outbound sales and servicing activity of the Commercial Lending and Business Banking activity/function in the Syracuse region. Small business expert for this segment.

Responsible for the development and growth of five (5) Commercial Lenders whose responsibilities and goals included the management of existing Commercial relationship within the bank and the new business development in a holistic approach.

Responsible for the daily management and monitoring of a $25,000.0 lending portfolio through ten (10) Bank branch offices covering three Western NY counties. Activities included the development of new and existing loan business as well as solicitation of retail, trust & investment and insurance business.

Responsible for the outbound sales and management of Business Banking Credits along with the cash management sales of related bank products. Also active in the preparation of case and credit analysis cases for the origination of bank assets.

Responsible for the complete and accurate completion of client job work-papers for a variety of industries including Municipal, Private, Real Estate, Manufacturing, Wholesale and Retail segments of the local business market.

Responsible for the preparation and submission of timely and accurate payments of both the Coated and Medical Product vendor invoice: maintained accounts payable system and all raw material transactions for subsidiary plants in Alpena, MI;. Pittsburgh, PA and Buffalo, NY.

skills.name: Commercial Lending
skills.explanation: Has over 25 years of experience in commercial lending, including management and development of lending officers, and achieving significant growth in lending originations and portfolio balance, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held various leadership roles, including Senior Lending Officer and Commercial TEAM Leader, with responsibilities for managing and developing teams, indicating expert-level proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Business Development
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in business development, including outbound sales and management of business banking credits, and solicitation of retail, trust & investment and insurance business, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has a degree in Accounting and experience as a Staff Accounts Payable Clerk, indicating strong proficiency in accounting.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Has experience as an Advanced Staff Auditor, indicating solid working proficiency in auditing.

skills.name: Cash Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in cash management sales of related bank products, indicating solid working proficiency in cash management.

skills.name: Credit Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience in preparing case and credit analysis cases for the origination of bank assets, indicating solid working proficiency in credit analysis.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing lending portfolios and monitoring credit risk, indicating some practical experience in risk management.
